DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect whole-body vibration presence absence localize radiofrequency body composition obese female subject . Moreover , balance strength test perform . The study hypothesis whole-body vibration induces positive change body composition i.e. , reduction fat mass increase lean mass associate increase performance . The possible additive role radiofrequency also assess .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Whole-body Vibration With Without Localized Radiofrequency Body Composition Obese Female Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: - recruitment female obese subject - baseline assessment ( body composition DXA , blood test , balance strength test ) - 3-mo whole body vibration training ( 2 session week , 30 min per session ) without local delivery radiofrequency ( two randomly select group ) - final assessment ( body composition DXA , blood test , balance strength test ) - data collation analysis
DOC.criteria: BMI : > 25 normal locomotion inform consent form sign acute illness endocrine pathology diabetes mellitus vascular pathology pacemaker pregnancy
